body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Car Dealership. My name is Walter Flores. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Walter! My name is Kathryn Johnson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathryn! Can you kindly provide me with your phone number, one seven zero zero, and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my phone number is six seven eight five five five one two three four, and my email is kathryn.johnson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information with me, Kathryn. Can you also confirm your home address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State ABC, six seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathryn, for providing your details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm good for now. Thank you for your help, Walter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kathryn! If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
